Package org.springframework.boot.security.autoconfigure.actuate.web.servlet

@NullMarked package org.springframework.boot.security.autoconfigure.actuate.web.servlet
Auto-configuration for actuator security using Spring MVC.
  • Class
    Description
    EndpointRequest
    Factory that can be used to create a RequestMatcher for actuator endpoint locations.
    EndpointRequest.AdditionalPathsEndpointRequestMatcher
    The request matcher used to match against additional paths for actuator endpoints.
    EndpointRequest.EndpointRequestMatcher
    The request matcher used to match against actuator endpoints.
    EndpointRequest.LinksRequestMatcher
    The request matcher used to match against the links endpoint.
    ManagementWebSecurityAutoConfiguration
    Auto-configuration for Spring Security when actuator is on the classpath.
    RequestMatcherProvider
    Interface that can be used to provide a RequestMatcher that can be used with Spring Security.
    SecurityRequestMatchersManagementContextConfiguration
    ManagementContextConfiguration that configures the appropriate RequestMatcherProvider.
    SecurityRequestMatchersManagementContextConfiguration.JerseyRequestMatcherConfiguration
     
    SecurityRequestMatchersManagementContextConfiguration.MvcRequestMatcherConfiguration
